title: Python Tutorial
description: An introduction to the Python language and its environment.

title: Python Home
description: The starting point for your Python learning journey.

title: Python Intro
description: Discover the basics, philosophy, and applications of Python.

title: Python Get Started
description: Set up your development environment and run your first Python code.

title: Python Syntax
description: Understand the fundamental rules and structure of Python code.

title: Python Comments
description: Learn how to add non-executable notes to your Python code.

title: Python Variables
description: Store and manage data using variables in Python.

title: Python Data Types
description: Explore the built-in data types like strings, numbers, and booleans.

title: Python Numbers
description: Work with different numeric types: integers, floats, and complex numbers.

title: Python Casting
description: Convert between different data types in Python.

title: Python Strings
description: Manipulate and work with text data using Python strings.

title: Python Booleans
description: Understand True/False values and logical operations.

title: Python Operators
description: Perform operations on values and variables using various operators.

title: Python Lists
description: Learn about ordered, mutable collections of items.

title: Python Tuples
description: Work with ordered, immutable collections of items.

title: Python Sets
description: Discover unordered collections of unique items.

title: Python Dictionaries
description: Store data in key-value pairs with Python dictionaries.

title: Python If...Else
description: Implement conditional logic to control program flow.

title: Python While Loops
description: Repeat blocks of code as long as a condition is true.

title: Python For Loops
description: Iterate over sequences (lists, tuples, strings) and other iterable objects.

title: Python Functions
description: Define and call reusable blocks of code.

title: Python Lambda
description: Create small, anonymous functions using the lambda keyword.

title: Python Arrays
description: Understand arrays as a special type of list (using array module).

title: Python Classes
description: Learn Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) with classes and objects.

title: Python Inheritance
description: Create new classes from existing ones, inheriting attributes and methods.

title: Python Iterators
description: Understand how to traverse collections using iterators.

title: Python Scope
description: Manage variable visibility (local, global, nonlocal).

title: Python Modules
description: Organize your code into reusable files and packages.

title: Python Datetime
description: Work with dates and times using the datetime module.

title: Python Math
description: Perform mathematical operations with the math module.

title: Python JSON
description: Parse and generate JSON data in Python.

title: Python RegEx
description: Use regular expressions for pattern matching and text manipulation.

title: Python PIP
description: Manage Python packages with the pip installer.

title: Python Try Except
description: Handle errors and exceptions gracefully.

title: Python User Input
description: Get input from the user during program execution.

title: Python String Formatting
description: Format strings using f-strings, .format(), and % operator.

title: Python File Handling
description: Learn to read from and write to files.

title: Python File Open
description: Open files in various modes for reading or writing.

title: Python File Write
description: Write text content to files.

title: Python File Read
description: Read text content from files.

title: Python File Delete
description: Remove files from the file system.
